title: UNIX - Isolate Prod Like Environment on dedicated P9

task_list.instruction_title:
Please set up the EVx environments - 2 SafeHost P9 as follows :

IBC-9040-MR9-78DA96X-14p : EV3
IBC-9040-MR9-78DAD5X-12p : EV1, EV2, EV5, EV5, EV6, EV7


In this configuration, the EV3 batches will be \"alone\", in iso-PRD configuration and not in competition with another batches (EV1/EV2).




Note : De-isolation is done within IP task [PRE-5256](PRE-5256_116109800.html)
